page.title: 08BOXFORD CHURCH Cont.
page.content:
Voluntary Work for the Church.
This is about the soft toys Miss Osborne makes. Miss Osborne has been making soft toys for 19 years now. She makes them to sell and most of the money goes towards Boxford Church, she gets the material from factories and people is the village. She makes her own patterns and designs. The material she uses makes the toys look so life-like. To make them sometimes she uses a sewing machine but most of it is done by hand. It takes between a day to a week, depending upon the size of the toy. She makes all kinds of soft toys. She makes teddys and animals such as dogs, hedgehogs, cats, bears, badgers, lions, tigers, foxes, monkeys, frogs and snakes.
